title: The Ghost-Train's Echo
description: The old 'Coal-Track' is vibrating with the sound of a steam engine that was scrapped decades ago. Something is trying to complete the 'Final Run'.

turns.narrative: The rusted tracks of the Coal-Track stretch into the permanent indigo fog of the 'South-Pass'. You hear a rhythmic, heavy thumping from the distance—CHUG-CHUG-CHUG—accompanied by the whistle of a spirit made of steam.
turns.choice_a: Lay your ear to the rail (Perc DC 12)
turns.consequence_a: Success: You hear the voices of the passengers, frozen in a loop of their final conversation. (+1 Lore)
turns.choice_b: Block the track with an iron-beam (Str DC 13)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The vibration increases as the 'Echo' hits the obstacle. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: A 'Ghost-Engine'—a locomotive made of translucent, blue-white smoke—thunders toward you out of the fog.

turns.narrative: The Ghost-Engine is cold, draining the heat from the air. It isn't a solid object, but its passage is enough to crush the tracks beneath it.
turns.choice_a: Jump onto the moving train (Athletics DC 14)
turns.consequence_a: Success: You grab a smoke-handle and pull yourself into the cab. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You force the Echo toward a 'Dead-End' siding. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Ghost-Engineer—a skeletal figure in a scorched uniform—is pulling the throttle with a frantic energy.

turns.narrative: The Engineer's eyes are glowing blue flames. He's shouting about a 'Bridge that isn't there'. You see the end of the track approaching—a thousand-foot drop into the 'Mana-Abyss'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: He reveals the 'Final Run' was a delivery of 'Hope' that never arrived. (+1 Lore)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You fight the phantom-power to slow the train. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The train is accelerating. The sound of the wind is a chorus of a thousand lost souls.

turns.narrative: A 'Vapor-Gosh'—a bird-construct made of steam—is trying to peck through the cab's glass. It's a guardian of the 'Final Run'.
turns.choice_a: Swat it away with a fire-poker
turns.consequence_a: Success: You drive the bird back into the fog. (+100 XP)
turns.consequence_b: Success: It lands on your shoulder, its body warm and comforting. (+1 Gear)
turns.convergence: The 'Bridge-Gap' is now visible. It's a literal wound in reality, bleeding violet light.

turns.narrative: The Engineer is praying. He hands you a 'Silver-Coal'—the train's last fuel-source. 'Feed the light!' he commands.
turns.choice_a: Toss the coal into the firebox
turns.consequence_a: Success: The train glows golden, and a bridge of light forms across the abyss. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The train plunges, but you jump to safety with a valuable artifact. (+1 Loot)
turns.convergence: The train crosses the abyss, landing in the 'Old-World' station, which is now a ruin of bone and clockwork.

turns.narrative: The station is inhabited by 'Passenger-Shadows'—entities that represent the regret of those who never arrived. They want your 'Life-Heat'.
turns.choice_a: Banish them with the Star-Glass Prism (if you have it) (Arcana DC 14)
turns.consequence_a: Success: The shadows are pacified by the logical light. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: They fade peacefully, leaving behind 'Shadow-Tokens'. (+1 Loot)
turns.convergence: The Ghost-Engine is slowing down. Its smoke-form is becoming solid iron as it reaches its final destination.

turns.narrative: The stationmaster's office contains the 'Lost-Cargo'—a crate of 'Void-Seeds' that was meant to rebuild the world.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You find a 'Void-Apple'—a fruit that tastes like the sun. (+1 Secret)
turns.choice_b: Guard the cargo for the Council (Endurance DC 15)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You stand watch until the retrieval team arrives. (+5 Reputation)
turns.convergence: The Ghost-Engineer salutes you and dissolves into a cloud of peaceful, white steam.

turns.narrative: You're in the Old-World ruin. Your gear is covered in 'Ghost-Dust', which makes you slightly invisible in the dark.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You find a 'Ghost-TICKET' that can open any lock on the Coal-Track. (+1 Gear)
turns.convergence: A 'Scourge-Vulture'—a massive, rotting bird—is circling the station roof.

turns.narrative: The Vulture lunges, its talons made of rusted scrap-metal. It wants the cargo you've uncovered.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You scald the bird until it flees. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The predator is no more. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: The retrieval team from the city arrives, led by the Master of Trains.

turns.narrative: The Master of Trains is weeping. He was a boy when this train went missing. He offers you a 'Golden-Ticket' as thanks.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You can travel anywhere on the settlement's infrastructure for free. (+1 Gear)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You have a source of eternal heat. (+1 Luck)

conclusion: The Ghost-Train's Echo has been laid to rest. The 'Void-Seeds' are back in the Council's hands, and the Master of Trains can finally move on.

risk_matrix.penalty: Train crashes. -10 Morale and the Coal-Track is permanently disabled.
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor consequences.

unlock_conditions.trigger: Coal-Track rails begin vibrating at midnight

permanent_effects.settlement: Void-Seeds returned to Council; Coal-Track spiritually cleared

branching_outcomes.result: Bridge of light manifests; full run completed
Train crashes; player escapes with artifact
